name: Happy Farmer
description:
It's a beautiful summer's day. You work as a farmhand at your grandparent's. Please help them with the chores!

Use Google Chrome for best player experience. Allow 10-15s for the game to load. Login isn't required (press "skip login").

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
